nodes.body: bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa’i cho ga (footnote: Bod rgya tshig mdzod chen mo: yul slob dpon nam rten gyi drung du kun slong gus pa dang bcas pas spyod lam stan dma' ba la 'dug cing rgyan gsar pas mi rgyan par/ dus snga dro'i dus su nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi dus khrims de/ slob dpon gyis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa tshang bar 'bog pa'i cho ga'i tshig rjes zlos lan gsum du byed pa/) = upavasatha. Ex: Bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa’i cho ga (W13100).
nodes.title: About One-day lay person’s vow ritual
